short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A cute extension to show all cookies on the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Cookie Jar 🍪

Say hello to Jar, your adorable and helpful sidekick for cookie management! With Cookie Jar, exploring cookies on your current page becomes a fun and intuitive adventure. Whether you're a developer diving into web data or just curious about the cookies on your favourite sites, Cookie Jar makes inspecting and understanding them a breeze with just a click.

Features:
- 🕵️‍♂️ Discover all cookies on the current page with ease.
- 🎨 Charming and playful UI with lovely pastel hues.
- 💬 Clear and concise cookie details at a glance.

Add Cookie Jar to your Chrome toolbar and turn cookie management into a delightful journey!
